headline: Otis Selected for Major Escalator Modernization Across London Underground Network
summary: Otis (NYSE: OTIS), the world's leading elevator and escalator manufacturing, installation, and service company, has been selected by Transport for London (TfL) to deliver a comprehensive service and modernization program for 172 escalators across the London Underground network.
